mapper.select: SELECT c.order_id, c.product_id, c.appoint_money AS appoint_money, c.integral, p.product_name, o.appoint_time FROM `customer_user_integral_item` AS c LEFT JOIN p_product AS p ON c.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN p_order AS o ON c.order_id = o.id WHERE c.customer_user_id = #{userId} AND c.del_flag = 0
SELECT IFNULL( SUM( integral ), 0 ) AS integral FROM customer_user_integral_item WHERE customer_user_id = #{userId}
